title: Why do People obsess over getting Pentakills so much?
body:
For me, Pentakills are great and all; I mean they're cool, but they don't really mean much other than letting you be able to brag to your friends for the next couple of days (Which I think is stupid because it just proves that you need to boast your accomplishments to make your friends think you're good). When I have picked up a quadra and have to choose between chasing an enemy for the 5th kill or ending the game, I'd choose to end the game every time. However, some people need to chase that kill because it would be the end of the world if they weren't to get it. That frustrates the hell out of me. 

In addition, I don't understand why so many people get upset when they lose a Penta. For instance, it gets stolen. They completely freak out and most of the time go afk and troll just because they didn't receive their super important Penta that will make them feel better about their low rank and skill. I mean, I never see any high elo players get upset about losing a Penta. It might be because they've earned many already but also because they are HUMBLE, unlike many brats I've been playing with.
